text: Motion

Everyone is good, aren't they~...!
Let's sing our hearts out with this momentum!

Hey, Kogane~
You haven"t forgotten our purpose, have you~?

To decide on the unit's concept,
let's deepen our bonds with each other! Right?

Hehe, thank you, Yuika.
I was getting mesmerized by everyone's singing voices.

But, Kiriko hasn't sung yet~!
We can talk about that later~!

Yeah, sorry, Kiririn~!
Here, insert this song!

Um, uh... Yeah...
...Alright...!

Well then...
P-Please... take care of me!
Wow~!

Hmm, when it comes to Gothic...
Surprising, but Kiriko likes this kind of song, huh?

I haven't really listened to Gothic songs much before~!
But, it"s pretty cool, huh~...!

I listen to them occasionally.
It's a genre I quite like.

Is that so? Sakuya-chan is versatile,
not just sticking to the prince route, huh?

Hehe, it's not like that. But I do have an
image of Mamimi in these kinds of songs as well.
...Well, I don't dislike it, you know-

It's kind of a common ground for everyone, isn't it?
Ah- There's still so much we don't know about each other.
I see, you gave it a try with that, huh...!

Our unit's concept!
We're going with... "Gothic"!
